metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Phoenix Lubbins - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group2_Prisoner1 aede3e82-f02b-4d6c-a92f-e9418b1b0e37 - (39; 39; 67)  in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to the NPC

0.speaker: Phoenix Lubbins
0.text: Bloody hells... I was a goner for sure - thank you.

1.speaker: Phoenix Lubbins
1.text: Can't wait to tell my Spanner about all this, he'll never believe it.
